creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Short coat of a theatrical costume of rust-red satin embroidered with five four-clawed dragons in gold. Dragons also appear on the shaped sections attached to under arm sections and to lower front of coat. Conventional border, lacking stripes front and back. Sleeves of red and gold brocade banded with brown and gold brocade. Around bottom, sides, and shoulder sections a border of black satin with metal studs, and an outer border of shaped tiger claws of vari-colored brocade. Lining of pink satin painted with cranes, bats, clouds, floral sprays, and peach.
title: Theatrical military jacket
